title.rendered: “IDF Intensifies Operations in Gaza: Key Strikes Against Hamas in Rafah and Tel al-Sultan”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF forces continue combat operations in the Rafah area and in the central Gaza Strip; the combat team of Brigade 401 is acting against the terrorist organization’s infrastructure and terrorists of Hamas in the Tel al-Sultan neighborhood.

The forces of Division 162 continue to operate in the Rafah area. The combat team of the Givati Brigade eliminated several terrorists in various clashes over the past 24 hours. The combat team of Brigade 401 is significantly active in the Tel al-Sultan neighborhood, targeting terrorist infrastructure and Hamas terrorists.

The combat team of the Alexandroni Brigade (3) continues fighting in the central Gaza Strip and conducts raids on terrorist infrastructure in the area. Combat team forces, in coordination with Air Force aircraft, eliminated several terrorists who were in a structure posing a threat to the unit.

Attached is documentation from IDF operations in the Gaza Strip: https://we.tl/t-eLjcyRdb9d

Attached is documentation from IDF strikes in the Gaza Strip: https://we.tl/t-ZJ6peGdlHd

Attached are images from IDF operations in the Gaza Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC190720242534
